verses.verse: Thou shalt not sacrifice<WH2076> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> any bullock<WH7794>, or sheep<WH7716>, wherein is blemish<WH3971>, or any evilfavouredness<WH7451> <WH1697>: for that is an abomination<WH8441> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>. sheep: or, goat

If there be found<WH4672> among<WH7130> you, within any<WH259> of thy gates<WH8179> which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee, man<WH376> or woman<WH802>, that hath wrought<WH6213> wickedness<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, in transgressing<WH5674> his covenant<WH1285>,

And hath gone<WH3212> and served<WH5647> other<WH312> gods<WH430>, and worshipped<WH7812> them, either the sun<WH8121>, or moon<WH3394>, or any of the host<WH6635> of heaven<WH8064>, which I have not commanded<WH6680>;

And it be told<WH5046> thee, and thou hast heard<WH8085> of it, and enquired<WH1875> diligently<WH3190>, and, behold, it be true<WH571>, and the thing<WH1697> certain<WH3559>, that such abomination<WH8441> is wrought<WH6213> in Israel<WH3478>:

Then shalt thou bring forth<WH3318> that man<WH376> or that woman<WH802>, which have committed<WH6213> that wicked<WH7451> thing<WH1697>, unto thy gates<WH8179>, even that man<WH376> or that woman<WH802>, and shalt stone<WH5619> them with stones<WH68>, till they die<WH4191>.

At the mouth<WH6310> of two<WH8147> witnesses<WH5707>, or three<WH7969> witnesses<WH5707>, shall he that is worthy of death<WH4191> be put to death<WH4191>; but at the mouth<WH6310> of one<WH259> witness<WH5707> he shall not be put to death<WH4191>.

The hands<WH3027> of the witnesses<WH5707> shall be first<WH7223> upon him to put him to death<WH4191>, and afterward<WH314> the hands<WH3027> of all the people<WH5971>. So thou shalt put<WH1197> the evil<WH7451> away<WH1197> from among<WH7130> you.

If there arise a matter<WH1697> too hard<WH6381> for thee in judgment<WH4941>, between blood<WH1818> and blood<WH1818>, between plea<WH1779> and plea<WH1779>, and between stroke<WH5061> and stroke<WH5061>, being matters<WH1697> of controversy<WH7379> within thy gates<WH8179>: then shalt thou arise<WH6965>, and get thee up<WH5927> into the place<WH4725> which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall choose<WH977>;

And thou shalt come<WH935> unto the priests<WH3548> the Levites<WH3881>, and unto the judge<WH8199> that shall be in those days<WH3117>, and enquire<WH1875>; and they shall shew<WH5046> thee the sentence<WH1697> of judgment<WH4941>:

And thou shalt do<WH6213> according to the sentence<WH6310> <WH1697>, which they of that place<WH4725> which the LORD<WH3068> shall choose<WH977> shall shew<WH5046> thee; and thou shalt observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> according to all that they inform<WH3384> thee:

According to the sentence<WH6310> of the law<WH8451> which they shall teach<WH3384> thee, and according to the judgment<WH4941> which they shall tell<WH559> thee, thou shalt do<WH6213>: thou shalt not decline<WH5493> from the sentence<WH1697> which they shall shew<WH5046> thee, to the right hand<WH3225>, nor to the left<WH8040>.

And the man<WH376> that will do<WH6213> presumptuously<WH2087>, and will not hearken<WH8085> unto the priest<WH3548> that standeth<WH5975> to minister<WH8334> there before the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, or unto the judge<WH8199>, even that man<WH376> shall die<WH4191>: and thou shalt put away<WH1197> the evil<WH7451> from Israel<WH3478>. and will: Heb. not to hearken
And all the people<WH5971> shall hear<WH8085>, and fear<WH3372>, and do no more presumptuously<WH2102>.

When thou art come<WH935> unto the land<WH776> which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee, and shalt possess<WH3423> it, and shalt dwell<WH3427> therein, and shalt say<WH559>, I will set<WH7760> a king<WH4428> over me, like as all the nations<WH1471> that are about<WH5439> me;

Thou shalt in any wise<WH7760> set<WH7760> him king<WH4428> over thee, whom the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall choose<WH977>: one from among<WH7130> thy brethren<WH251> shalt thou set<WH7760> king<WH4428> over thee: thou mayest<WH3201> not set<WH5414> a stranger<WH5237> <WH376> over thee, which is not thy brother<WH251>.

But he shall not multiply<WH7235> horses<WH5483> to himself, nor cause the people<WH5971> to return<WH7725> to Egypt<WH4714>, to the end that he should multiply<WH7235> horses<WH5483>: forasmuch as the LORD<WH3068> hath said<WH559> unto you, Ye shall henceforth<WH3254> return<WH7725> no more that way<WH1870>.
Neither shall he multiply<WH7235> wives<WH802> to himself, that his heart<WH3824> turn<WH5493> not away: neither shall he greatly<WH3966> multiply<WH7235> to himself silver<WH3701> and gold<WH2091>.

And it shall be, when he sitteth<WH3427> upon the throne<WH3678> of his kingdom<WH4467>, that he shall write<WH3789> him a copy<WH4932> of this law<WH8451> in a book<WH5612> out of that which is before<WH6440> the priests<WH3548> the Levites<WH3881>:

And it shall be with him, and he shall read<WH7121> therein all the days<WH3117> of his life<WH2416>: that he may learn<WH3925> to fear<WH3372> the LORD<WH3068> his God<WH430>, to keep<WH8104> all the words<WH1697> of this law<WH8451> and these statutes<WH2706>, to do<WH6213> them:

That his heart<WH3824> be not lifted up<WH7311> above his brethren<WH251>, and that he turn not aside<WH5493> from the commandment<WH4687>, to the right hand<WH3225>, or to the left<WH8040>: to the end that he may prolong<WH748> his days<WH3117> in his kingdom<WH4467>, he, and his children<WH1121>, in the midst<WH7130> of Israel<WH3478>.
